title: Bug-Splat (or so I believe)

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body:
Happened over a hour ago.

When I log-in (every single time) it says I crashed and attempts to reconnect me although that's the error message I get when It loads for too long and fails.

I need my account kicked out of the game or somehow returned to the lobby because I can't reconnect. I doubt an aram game lasts over a hour with 4 people.

replies.body: yeah. My account is definitely nulled or something. Ripperoni.

Hi

I had a look over the servers you were connected to yesterday, but couldn't see any sign of issues at those times.

Have you been able to get back in and play successfully?

Cheers
Mindstar
